Get the expressed genes

Source: R/get_expressed_genes.R
get_expressed_genes.Rd

Takes in a gtf file and a dataframe with expressed genes from a specific tissue. Filters the gtf file for genes and keeps those that are present in the tissue dataframe passed in.

get_expressed_genes(gtf_path, species = "Homo_sapiens", tissue_df)

Arguments

gtf_path

gtf file path
species

character string containing the species to filter for, Homo sapiens is the default
tissue_df

dataframe containing the expressed genes for a particular tissue

Value

GRanges with the expressed genes for a specific tissue

Examples

# \dontshow{
gtf_url <- paste0(
    "http://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-103/gtf/",
    "homo_sapiens/Homo_sapiens.GRCh38.103.chr.gtf.gz"
)
# .file_cache is an internal function to download a bigwig file from a link
# if the file has been downloaded recently, it will be retrieved from a cache
gtf_path <- ODER:::.file_cache(gtf_url)
# }
lung_tissue <- get_tissue(tissue = "lung")

lung_exp_genes <- get_expressed_genes(
    gtf_path = gtf_path,
    tissue_df = lung_tissue
)

lung_exp_genes
